p: We sequenced 1100 base pairs (bp) of the CYTB gene in 37 samples of Proechimys cuvieri from 22 localities and 54 samples of P. guyannensis from 20 localities within the study area, between northern French Guiana and Brazil, north of the Amazon River (Amapá and Pará). The two species were sympatric at 11 sites ( Fig 1). We also sequenced 800 bp of CYTB in 8 samples collected in Brazil (Amazonas and Roraima states), Venezuela, and Peru ( Fig 1) for phylogenetic analyses. Only 25 additional sequences were obtained from GenBank. We analyzed a total of 124 sequences of P. cuvieri and P. guyannensis in 50 localities; details on specimens, localities and GenBank accession numbers, are given in S1 Appendix.
